column4: fushot, even on a Mac with a Mac keyboard, I can't get USB flash drives to work... the extension cord shouldn't matter, but I think you'll need to plug the drive into its own port, not into a keyboard.
thank you, have any ideas why? or just one of those things?
not enough power. devices that get their power elsewhere can have up to 127 through a single port, but things like drives (even flash drives) are weird like that.
just weird cuase it lights up and everythign :( lol
